briefdescription.para: Describes extra tools that were used that are not part of the source.

detaileddescription.para: Describes extra tools that were used that are not part of the source.

sect1.title: Parse Tree Visual
sect1.para: The Jack2XML executable has an extra option that allows the parse tree to be output in .dot format.

sect1.title: GRM files
sect1.para: The grammar files are for the most part reference only. They do not use any of the code generation features of the Gold Parsing Engine. But they were initially written and tested with it
